product_name: Zoic Ether Quattro Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: Enjoy all-mountain forays in the feature-loaded ZOIC Ether Quattro Bike Shorts for men. They enhance your comfort with comfy liner shorts and a lightly padded chamois. Outer shorts feature stretchy fabric with a durable water repellent finish to shed moisture, mud and stains, and mesh panels down legs and along rear waist enhance air flow. Liner shorts are polyester/spandex mesh fabric for comfortable stretch, breathability and wicking. Plush elastic waistband on liner brief feels soft against the skin; inner leg openings feature elastic grippers to hold liner in place while you pedal. Elastic back waistband and rip-and-stick side tabs dial in the fit; front flat waistband has a snap closure and zip fly. Tech pocket with cord port holds a phone or music player; also features front hand pockets, 2 leg pockets with locking zippers, and 1 hidden back pocket. ZOIC Ether Quattro Bike Shorts have a gusset inseam panel that allows full freedom of movement and reduces seat hang-up. Includes a microfiber glasses wipe.
short_description: Enjoy all-mountain forays in the feature-loaded ZOIC Ether Quattro Bike Shorts for men. They enhance your comfort with comfy liner shorts and a lightly padded chamois.
